responses: To use the website, you need to register for an account. If you already have one, log in with your details.
To write a note, go to the dashboard and click 'New Note'. You can type your text or record your voice.
You can edit a note by opening it and clicking 'Edit'.

patterns: how do I delete a note
responses: To delete, select the note and click 'Delete'.
You can pin notes to keep them at the top, move them to fixed sections, or drag & drop to rearrange.
Use the search bar to find notes quickly. You can also apply filters to organize your notes.
You can import notes from files or export them. Just choose the file type (PDF, TXT, etc.) and save.
You can set a reminder for your notes. The system will notify you at the chosen time.
You can report your mood daily, and the system will track it for your personal insights.
You can chat with the AI chatbot for quick help and guidance on using the website.

patterns: what do I get with pro
how long for admin to approve
when will I get pro access
responses: Free users have limited notes and access to basic features. With the Pro version, you get unlimited notes, advanced tools, and priority support.
To upgrade, you need to purchase the Pro subscription and submit your transaction ID.
After you provide the transaction ID, the admin will review and approve your Pro access.

If you forgot your password, click 'Forgot Password' on the login page to reset it.
You can change your password in your account settings under 'Security'.
Our mission is to help users organize their notes, track moods, and stay productive.
Alpha Omen is designed to combine note-taking, reminders, and personal insights in one platform.
Categories help you organize notes by topics or projects.
Using categories makes it easier to find, filter, and manage related notes.
You can use the built-in calculator without leaving the app. Just click the calculator button in the sidebar.
To edit your username, click your profile in the top right corner, then update your username as you like.
